mapper.insert: insert into zzim(content_id, user_id, first_image, addr1, title) values(#{content_id},#{user_id}, #{first_image}, #{addr1}, #{title})
mapper.delete: delete from zzim where content_id = #{content_id} and user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.select: select * from zzim where user_id = #{user_id} order by content_id desc
